info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:37PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN BUTLER...NORTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND...SOUTHERN ARMSTRONG AND SOUTHWESTERN CLARION COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 537 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Freeport, or 8 miles southwest of Kittanning, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Kittanning, Ford City, Leechburg, Freeport, West Kittanning, West Leechburg, Worthington, Hyde Park, West Hills, Manorville, Ford Cliff, Applewold, Lenape Heights, Templeton, and Crooked Creek Lake Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
